services.layer: Fullstack development services focused on building scalable, high-performance digital solutions.
services.custom_website.description: Complete development of websites, combining modern visual interfaces with robust backend systems, tailored to the specific needs of each business.
services.api_development.description: Creation of efficient RESTful and GraphQL APIs, as well as integration with external services such as payment platforms, CRMs, and custom systems.
services.e_commerce.description: Deployment of full-featured online stores, including shopping carts, payment gateway integration (Stripe, PayPal, MercadoPago), product management, and admin dashboards.
services.saas.description: Development of SaaS (Software as a Service) applications featuring subscription models, user dashboards, administrative areas, and scalable infrastructure.
services.landing_page.description: Design and development of high-conversion landing pages aligned with digital marketing strategies, lead capture systems, and CRM or database integrations.
services.maintenance.description: Ongoing maintenance services, performance optimization, and security updates to ensure the quality, security, and continuous improvement of digital applications.
